archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0834
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Fraud Manager I want our case management system to be able to interface with our recoveries/collections systems to enable info sharing without duplication of information

properties.value: Use case here is to stop collections in case a fraud is detected and registered. A manual decision by fraud manager.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
